sentences.en: He is a very underrated poet.
sentences.cn: 他是一名才华被严重低估的诗人。

sentences.en: He was a painter and poet.
He was a poet and an ardent spiritualist.
sentences.cn: 他是位诗人，也是忠实的招魂论者。

sentences.en: He writes beautifully, as befits a poet.
sentences.cn: 他文笔优美，适合当诗人。

sentences.en: His fame as a poet did not come until after his death.
sentences.cn: 他死后才获得诗人的名声.

sentences.en: Li Bai was a Tang poet of superb talent.
sentences.cn: 李白是唐代一位才气横溢的诗人.

sentences.en: Sometimes he is funny; sometimes he seems like a poet.
sentences.cn: 有时他很滑稽, 有时他又像个诗人.

sentences.en: The book explores contrasting views of the poet's early work.
sentences.cn: 此书探讨了人们对这位诗人早期作品截然不同的观点。

sentences.en: The concept of the Rose continued to inform the poet's work.
sentences.cn: 玫瑰的概念持续贯穿于诗人的作品中。

sentences.en: The poet compressed many thoughts and emotions into a few well - chosen words.
sentences.cn: 诗人将丰富的思想感情浓缩于几个精选的词语里.

sentences.en: The poet eloquently expresses the sense of lost innocence.
sentences.cn: 诗人动人地表达了失去天真的感觉.

sentences.en: The poet fell in love with her and immortalized her in his verse.
sentences.cn: 诗人爱上了她，并以诗歌使她名传后世。

sentences.en: The poet lived a happy life in his later life.
sentences.cn: 这位诗人晚年过着一种幸福的生活.

sentences.en: Winning the Nobel prize has lustered the poet's name.
sentences.cn: 获得诺贝尔奖使这位诗人的名望更高了.
